input: The door is locked and secure
output:
C - Determiner  
is - Verb, base form (VB)  
locked - Adjective (JJ)  
and - Coordinating conjunction (CC)  
secure - Adjective (JJ)  

Thus, "locked" has the part of speech tag: JJ.
